DOC.criteria: Criteria primary insomnia : subjective complaint difficulty initiate maintain sleep , wake early nonrestorative sleep daytime consequence result poor sleep duration least 1 month sleep disturbance secondary medical psychiatric condition Criteria good sleeper : subjective report consistent good sleep significant medical psychiatric illness diagnosis sleep disorder insomnia woman pregnant lactate past 6 month nonfluency speak write English Current shift work define work even night shift Current use medication affect sleep BMI > 27
